trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_SEQ_00<tab>Ryosen has lost sight of something important.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_00<tab>Find Ryosen's grandson.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_01<tab>Confront the Lupin looters.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_02<tab>Obtain the stolen mugworts.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the mugworts to Ryosen's grandson.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_04<tab>Obtain waterweed.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the waterweed to Ryosen's grandson.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_TODO_06<tab>Report to Ryosen.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_000<tab>I have lost my grandchild! Please, help me search for him.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_001<tab>He was right next to me until a short while ago. I cannot believe I lost sight of him so easily.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_002<tab>He was asking a lot of questions about the One River; perhaps he went there searching for something.

TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_003<tab>Though, I truly hope that is not the case. I have heard that a group of Lupin looters roam the area of late. Please search along the One River for my grandson. I shall continue to look for him here.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_004<tab>Please search for my grandson by the One River. I shall continue to look for him here.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_010<tab>Grandfather is looking for me, you say? But I cannot go back just yet! I am still searching for that which was taken from me.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_011<tab>I was minding my own business, gathering mugworts, when some nasty Lupin stole them right out of my hands!
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_012<tab>Would you ask the Lupin if they would give me back my plants? You'll find them on the other side of the river.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_013<tab>Would you ask the Lupin if they would give me back my plants? You'll find them on the other side of the river.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_014<tab>Where could he have gone to? Oh, I do hope he is safe...
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_WEREWOLF02733_000_020<tab>You would have us return some insignificant child's mugworts? Do not make me laugh.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_WEREWOLF02733_000_021<tab>This whole area belongs to us, including any plants that may happen to be plucked by a child of man.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_POP_MESSAGE_000_022<tab>You are under attack!
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BALLOON_000_022<tab>You shall regret this!
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_030<tab>I wonder if the Lupin will give back my plants...
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_040<tab>Did you get them to return my mugworts?
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_041<tab>Oh, thank you so much!

TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_042<tab>I was trying to collect plants to make some medicine. I read about it in one of my grandfather's botanicy books! There are so many sick people in the village. I just wanted to help.

TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_043<tab>There is one more thing I need for the medicine: waterweed. I tried to fish some out of the river earlier with a pole. But I didn't have much luck. Could you get some for me?
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_044<tab>There is one more thing I need for the medicine: waterweed. It's found at the bottom of rivers. Could you get some for me?
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_050<tab>Did you get some waterweed?
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_051<tab>Yay! Now I have everything I need!
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_BOY02733_000_052<tab>I'll go back to Grandfather now. Thanks for your help!
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_060<tab>My grandson is at last returned! He told me all about how you helped him gather the ingredients he needed to make medicine.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_061<tab>While I am glad he has grown to be a kind-hearted boy, there is still much he need learn about discipline and manners.

TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_062<tab>However, those Lupin should really know better than to steal from a mere child. Their race was once famed for being loyal vassals to some of Doma's mightiest warlords.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_063<tab>When Doma was crushed by the Empire some of them managed to escape, choosing to live as bandits.
TEXT_STMBDZ410_02733_RYOSEN_000_064<tab>It pains me to see a race once so proud fall so low. Something else we have Garlemald to thank for, I suppose.
